snippet: Ex-Clipper Marcus Morris Sr. arrested on fraud charge. Brother, agent say matter has been overblown Former NBA player Marcus Morris Sr. was arrested Sunday at a Florida airport on a warrant out of Nevada and faces a fraud charge.
